fr

My Media tells stories for people who move the world forward.

We lift up the voices fighting for justice, opportunity, and habitability.


We are a youth-led creative agency that runs campaigns, creates content, builds brands, and makes websites for organizations that want to make the world better. We do:

Video.

Design.

Web.

Strategy.

Every one of us has a world-changing idea to share, we just need to learn how.

We also help young people learn creative skils in a hands-on environment through workshops, mentorship, and goal-based learning.

Find out more about our educational programs.
